text: PXM may refer to: * PXM, the IATA code for the Puerto Escondido International Airport * pxm, the file extension used by the Pixelmator image editing software * pxm, the ISO 693 code for the Quetzaltepec Mixe language, a variety of Midland Mixe * PXM, the acronym for processor switch modules in computer networks * PXM, the acronym for Product eXperience Management
title: PXM
